Title: Gem Glow
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven thinks his favorite ice cream sandwiches are the trick to summoning his magic shield but learns otherwise when facing off with an acid spewing insect monster.
